Text:
you can directly download this manga till current chapter at

http://anip.homeunix.com/manga/index.php?path=Full%20Metal%20Alchemist/

Thanks for the Torrent! After downloading and unpacking (can't remember if they were in .zip or .rar) I ended up with folders FMA 1-60 (a different folder for each volume.)  I've flipped through the first few chapters and everything seems to be working.  I haven't tried out the links mentioned for direct download, but I can recommend this torrent :D
-Minerva
